review:

I had visited Savla hospital for my wife pregnancy. Dr.shilpa given right suggestions to us every time,my wife is also feel very comfortable under her guidance. Even during covid peak time Dr. Shilpa given my wife full support/guidance. Under her treatment in October month we got our second baby.Me and my wife is so so much thankful to Dr.shilps for given such valuable support and guidance.She is the best gynaecologist.Even after delivery she supported my wife,we can never forget dr.shilpa's efforts.thank to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was consulting Dr. K. Chaudhary for the pre delivery care in the last 3 months of my pregnancy. Due to some domestic work, she was out of town and for any emergency she told to contact Dr. Shilpa Uppal Shah. And this is how I met the wonderful doctor Dr. Shilpa Uppal Shah.
 It was the wonderful experience with Dr. Shilpa. Very kind and friendly. She has handled my delivery with utmost care. Even though there was a nuchal cord around my baby, and  as I was the first time mother , I was worried about cord ,but she has made me believe that everything would be fine and trusted her. She is trustworthy and explained every aspects of pre and post delivery care. I would recommend her to every mother, be it a first time or second time mother. And by god grace, my delivery was smooth enough and in right & safe hands. Thank you Dr. Shilpa Uppal Shah.
Experience was very nice,I'd like to thank you For the excellent care I received during my delivery.you have blessed me with your expertise & gentle manner.thanks for the great experience.

In 9th month of pregnancy I have started taking consultation from doctor shilpa and that was the very bad decision of my life. She is not at all friendly. *** ******* ** **** ****** ******* *** *** ******* * **** *** ***** ** **** ** *** ******** ***** **** **** When you will ask any doubt or any suggestion from her, she will scold on you. she will say don't trouble me, don't come to me. Go to the other hospital. *** **** *** ********* ** ******** ********* ******* *** ** ******* She made me cry on every visit with her even on my delivery day also she said to me You need to pay for corona PPE kits otherwise you go to BMC hospital. My cesarean was scheduled at 11am and at 10am she was saying to my husband u take your patient to other hospital. she used words like leke jao na apke patient ko dusre hospital. muje pareshan mat karo. I was literally crying. she is very rudly. *** **** ********* ** ** *** ** **** ********** *** ***** ** ******** ********** Dont go to this doctor under any situation. ********* ******* *** **** **** **** *** ** *** ****** ** **** * ****** ***** *** *** *** ***** *** ** ****** ******** ***** Dear moms to be dont go to her for treatment ********* *** **** ***** *** *** ** **** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very talented doctor. Calm and good understanding. She attends call at anytime of emergency. We had good experienced of treatment while delivery of my wife. She helped and work hard for normal delivery. Baby born with good health. We took treatment from her from pre pregnancy to post delivery.
Very helpful and understands emotions of patients.
I will recommend her.
